Constants

This module defines the physical constants used by Dyad. It uses the values define by scipy.constants where they are available and defines new values where they are not.

dyad.constants.AU = 149597870700.0

Astronomical unit (\(\mathrm{m}\))

dyad.constants.DAY = 86400.0

Day (\(\mathrm{s}\))

dyad.constants.GRAV_CONST = 0.0002959122080881949

Gravitational constant (\(\mathrm{au}~\mathrm{day}^{-2}~\mathrm{M}_{\odot}^{-1}\))

dyad.constants.M_SUN = 1.98840987e+30

Solar mass (\(\mathrm{kg}\))
